import React from 'react'; import './scss/Blog.scss' import './scss/heart.scss' import Masonry from 'react-masonry-css' import { postArray } from './Array.jsx' import crown from './img/icons/crown.svg' export const Blog = () => { function cntLikes(i) { const cnt = document.querySelectorAll('span[class="likes"]')[i].outerText console.log(cnt) return cnt } function createMarkup(i) { return { __html: `
${postArray[i].author} ${postArray[i].dataCreated} ⋅ 1 min

${postArray[i].articleTitle}

${postArray[i].shortTxt}
${postArray[i].viewCnt} views 0 comments
${postArray[i].likeCnt}
`}; } function MyComponent(i) { return
; } const breakpointColumnsObj = { default: 2, 1100: 1, 700: 1, 500: 1 }; return (
{MyComponent(0)}
{MyComponent(1)}
{MyComponent(2)}
{MyComponent(3)}
{MyComponent(4)}
{MyComponent(5)}
 ) }
